knimeNode.name: Fasta Writer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Writes a .FASTA sequence file from three columns

fullDescription.intro: This node saves sequence data in fasta format. Each row becomes a single FASTA entry, comprising data from the 3 chosen columns: Accession, Description, Sequence. More information about the FASTA format can be found at wikipedia
fullDescription.option: Where to save the data to
Which column in the input to use as accessions
Which column in the input to use as description
Which column to use for the sequence data
